com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls

Class HlsChunkSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsChunkSource

  • class HlsChunkSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Source of Hls (possibly adaptive) chunks.

      A TrackSelection to use for initialization.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HlsChunkSource

        public HlsChunkSource(HlsExtractorFactory extractorFactory,
                      HlsPlaylistTracker playlistTracker,
                      HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl[] variants,
                      HlsDataSourceFactory dataSourceFactory,
                      TimestampAdjusterProvider timestampAdjusterProvider,
                      java.util.List<Format> muxedCaptionFormats)
        Parameters:
        extractorFactory - An HlsExtractorFactory from which to obtain the extractors for media chunks.
        playlistTracker - The HlsPlaylistTracker from which to obtain media playlists.
        variants - The available variants.
        dataSourceFactory - An HlsDataSourceFactory to create DataSources for the chunks.
        timestampAdjusterProvider - A provider of TimestampAdjuster instances. If multiple HlsChunkSources are used for a single playback, they should all share the same provider.
        muxedCaptionFormats - List of muxed caption Formats. Null if no closed caption information is available in the master playlist.

    • Method Detail

      • maybeThrowError

        public void maybeThrowError()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        If the source is currently having difficulty providing chunks, then this method throws the underlying error. Otherwise does nothing.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The underlying error.

      • setIsTimestampMaster

        public void setIsTimestampMaster(boolean isTimestampMaster)
        Sets whether this chunk source is responsible for initializing timestamp adjusters.
        Parameters:
        isTimestampMaster - True if this chunk source is responsible for initializing timestamp adjusters.

      • getNextChunk

        public void getNextChunk(HlsMediaChunk previous,
                         long playbackPositionUs,
                         long loadPositionUs,
                         HlsChunkSource.HlsChunkHolder out)
        Returns the next chunk to load.

        If a chunk is available then HlsChunkSource.HlsChunkHolder.chunk is set. If the end of the stream has been reached then HlsChunkSource.HlsChunkHolder.endOfStream is set. If a chunk is not available but the end of the stream has not been reached, HlsChunkSource.HlsChunkHolder.playlist is set to contain the HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl that refers to the playlist that needs refreshing.

        Parameters:
        previous - The most recently loaded media chunk.
        playbackPositionUs - The current playback position in microseconds. If playback of the period to which this chunk source belongs has not yet started, the value will be the starting position in the period minus the duration of any media in previous periods still to be played.
        loadPositionUs - The current load position in microseconds. If previous is null, this is the starting position from which chunks should be provided. Else it's equal to previous.endTimeUs.
        out - A holder to populate.

      • onChunkLoadCompleted

        public void onChunkLoadCompleted(Chunk chunk)
        Called when the HlsSampleStreamWrapper has finished loading a chunk obtained from this source.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The chunk whose load has been completed.

      • onChunkLoadError

        public boolean onChunkLoadError(Chunk chunk,
                                boolean cancelable,
                                java.io.IOException error)
        Called when the HlsSampleStreamWrapper encounters an error loading a chunk obtained from this source.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The chunk whose load encountered the error.
        cancelable - Whether the load can be canceled.
        error - The error.
        Returns:
        Whether the load should be canceled.

      • onPlaylistBlacklisted

        public void onPlaylistBlacklisted(HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl url,
                                  long blacklistMs)
        Called when a playlist is blacklisted.
        Parameters:
        url - The url that references the blacklisted playlist.
        blacklistMs - The amount of milliseconds for which the playlist was blacklisted.
